Pricing

An affordable and considerate model. Trial class anytime. Please see program for more information on each course type.


Program Info



Homework Help

$ 8 - 15 / hr

  • Tutors help with extracurricular or school based homework

Standard Courses

$ 12 - 20 / hr

  • School subject lessons
  • Notes, resources, and homework provided

Premium Courses

$ 12 - 25 / hr

  • Skilled courses or difficult extracurricular couses
  • After-class support by tutors between lessons

Workshop

$ 25 session

  • Test, high school, program entrence prep or Q&A

* Note all rates are calculated on an hourly basis.

Vantage Tutoring


For students, by students. A tutoring and teaching service connecting high schoolers with younger kids.
